actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the District of Columbia Code to prohibit, in the District of Columbia, discrimination on the basis of sex or marital status in commercial credit transactions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits, in the District of Columbia, discrimination on the basis of sex or marital status in commercial credit transactions. Provides for penalties for persons who discriminate in violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the District of Columbia Code to prohibit, in the District of Columbia, discrimination on the basis of sex or marital status in commercial credit transactions, and for other purposes.
